price: Dájúdájú àwọn tó ń jẹ dúkìá ọmọ òrukàn pẹ̀lú àbòsí, Iná kúkú ni wọ́n ń jẹ sínú ikùn wọn. Wọ́n sì máa wọ inú Iná tó ń jó.
arabic: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ يَأۡكُلُونَ أَمۡوَٰلَ ٱلۡيَتَٰمَىٰ ظُلۡمًا إِنَّمَا يَأۡكُلُونَ فِي بُطُونِهِمۡ نَارٗاۖ وَسَيَصۡلَوۡنَ سَعِيرٗا

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: inna alladhīna yakulūna amwāla al-yatāmā ẓul'man innamā yakulūna fī buṭūnihim nāran wasayaṣlawna saʿīran
